name: Forest Flyer
description:
Forest Flyer! (working title)

A trifecta game jam game... #UnrealJam #7dfps #ProcJam

Fly around mountains (not yet implemented) scooping up water (not yet implemented) to arm your water rockets to help fight forest fires.

Gamepad Controls
  • left stick - steering
  • left/right triggers - rudder
  • right stick - look
  • A button - shoot water rocket

Keyboard Controls
  • arrow keys/WSAD - steering
  • Q/E - rudder
  • space bar - shoot water rocket
Extra Controls
  • R - reset the game
  • F - randomly spawn a fire
Not Yet Implemented...
  • Sound
  • Procedurally generated terrain/mountains
  • Water
  • Refilling weapons by landing on water (like real life water bombers)
